Class MessageChannelExtensions

Extensions for IMessageChannel objects. Used a lot throughout the bot.

| Edit this page View Source

EmbedAsync(IMessageChannel, EmbedBuilder, string?)

Sends an embed message to the message channel asynchronously.

Declaration
public static Task<IUserMessage> EmbedAsync(this IMessageChannel ch, EmbedBuilder embed, string? msg = "")
Parameters
Type Name Description
IMessageChannel ch

The message channel to send the message to.
EmbedBuilder embed

The embed builder containing the embed message.
string msg

The optional message content to include.
Returns
Type Description
Task<IUserMessage>

A task representing the asynchronous operation, returning the sent user message.

SendConfirmAsync(IDiscordInteraction, string?, string?, string?, string?)

Sends a confirmation message to the interaction asynchronously.

Declaration
public static Task<IUserMessage> SendConfirmAsync(this IDiscordInteraction ch, string? title, string? text, string? url = null, string? footer = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IDiscordInteraction ch

The interaction to send the message to.
string title

The optional title of the confirmation message.
string text

The text content of the confirmation message.
string url

The optional URL to include in the confirmation message.
string footer

The optional footer text for the confirmation message.
Returns

SendTableAsync<T>(IMessageChannel, IEnumerable<T>, Func<T, string>, int)

Sends a table message asynchronously to the message channel.

Declaration
public static Task<IUserMessage> SendTableAsync<T>(this IMessageChannel ch, IEnumerable<T> items, Func<T, string> howToPrint, int columns = 3)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IMessageChannel ch

The message channel to send the table message to.
IEnumerable<T> items

The items to display in the table.
Func<T, string> howToPrint

The function that defines how to print each item.
int columns

The number of columns in the table (default is 3).
Returns
Type Description
Task<IUserMessage>

A task representing the asynchronous operation, returning the sent user message.
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The type of items in the table.

The function that defines how to print each item.
int columns

The number of columns in the table (default is 3).
Returns
